div.h2:
Welcome to Telluride School District R-1
"Through quality education, our students will achieve personal success."

div.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto; font-family: Calibri, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

br.br: For most up to date COVID-19 information in San Miguel County please go to:

div.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto; font-family: Calibri, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

div.span: Principals of each school are sending regular updates and teachers are providing remote learning lessons.

a.title: Public Notice of Board of Education Meetings

div.a: Public Notice of Board of Education Meetings
div.div: Information and links regarding upcoming BOE meetings and work sessions found here.

a.title: TSD Students in Need: Lunch Provided

div.a: TSD Students in Need: Lunch Provided
div.div: Student pack 'n go lunches for any student in Telluride, Rico, and Norwood. Change of location to east side of building for pick up. More changes for this Miners' Days.

a.title: At THS, we love our seniors!

div.a: At THS, we love our seniors!
div.div: Celebrate graduating seniors every Wednesday 4PM on KOTO.

a.title: New End of Year Calendar approved by BOE

div.a: New End of Year Calendar approved by BOE
div.div: School stays in session through mid May. New calendar links here.

a.title: TSD Updates Regarding the Corona Virus

div.a: TSD Updates Regarding the Corona Virus
div.div: Online learning continues. Schools in use for county-wide testing. Check here for updates.
